extendedInfo.description: **One of the top 6 hurricane tracking apps - CNN****Readersâ Pick: Most innovative and useful hurricane app â FastCompany****One of 5 apps to get you through a natural disaster â Fox News****Top Apps of the Week (11/3/12) â ABC News****Top Apps of the Week (10/29/12) - MediaBistro****Top App of the week (9/2/12) - Appolicious**Be ready for severe weather with Hurricane by American Red Cross. Monitor conditions in your area or throughout the storm track, prepare your family and home, find help and let others know you are safe even if the power is out â a must have for anyone who lives in an area where a hurricane may strike or has loved ones who do.Please note: shelters only show the current open shelters. More shelters are setup as disasters happen, but until then, there may not be any shelters near you.Features: - Step-by-step instructions let you know what to do even if the cell towers are down and the power is out.  - Monitor weather conditions in your area or those of loved-ones with location-based alerts for the U.S. and its territories from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration(NOAA). - Let family and friends know you are okay with the customizable âIâm Safeâ alert for Facebook, Twitter, email and text.  - Find open Red Cross shelters in your area when you need help. - Stay safe when the lights are out with the Hurricane Toolkit, including a strobe light, flashlight and audible alert functions.  - Prepare for the worst by learning how to assemble an emergency kit for your family in the event of power outage or evacuation. - Empower your family to stay safe and remain calm in an emergency by learning how to make and practice an emergency plan.  - Earn badges that you can share with your friends and show off your hurricane knowledge with interactive quizzes. - See an illustrated history of hurricanes in your area. - Learn the difference between a hurricane warning and watch. - Know how to what to do about food and drinking water when your area has been impacted by floods and power outages.Please update your app to the latest version as soon as possible! It address numerous critical issues with crashing!Permissions:DIRECTLY CALL PHONE NUMBERS: We need this to allow you to call emergency numbers from within the appCAMERA: We need to be able to use the camera to allow us to use the flashlight in Tool KitGPS LOCATION: We need to serve you hurricane alerts based on your current locationPHONE CONTACTS: We need this for the Make a Plan view to allow you to add emergency contacts straight from your address book

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: The only issue I had was making a plan. When I accidently touched the wrong name for out-of-town contact, I had to back all the way out of the app and start over to change it. Flashlight & strobe are very bright. Alarm is loud according to volume set.
reviews.author: Tamy Kittendorf

reviews.title: Good, but needs some work on maps
reviews.comment: Maps need to larger and should be able to zoom in or out.
reviews.author: Diane Garcia

reviews.title: Excellence Expected - Excellence Received
reviews.comment: The quality of the data provided is first rate.  If you have not downloaded the complete suite of ARC apps, you should.  They integrate well with each other, with none of the hiccups I would normally experienced with other so-called integrated apps.  Like they say \"it\'s better to have it and not need it...\"  someday you will need the apps. Act Now, before you need it.  Learn about the info provided before disaster strikes.
reviews.author: Bill Peterson

reviews.title: Red Cross location services
reviews.comment: Why does GPS have to be on for these Red Cross apps to send you hurricane/tornado warnings? All my other apps know where I am w/ gps turned off. GPS drains battery & phone not always outside w/ sattelite view. Please fix.
reviews.author: Frank Saunders

reviews.title: Much better however.........
reviews.comment: It would be beneficial to have a tab with the live weather map. Also,  would be real nice to an option like the wratjet channel has to show animation/estimated direction of the storm or hurricane. I found the map but I found it too far deep in the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very helpful and informative
reviews.comment: Love the tool to let family know you\'re safe via social media since trying to make a phone call is difficult to get through during a hurricane.
reviews.author: Deb Jean

reviews.title: Hurricane by Red Cross
reviews.comment: Crashes many times after alerts.
reviews.author: Philip Emile

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Most useful app I have found in a long time. Great info and helpful videos. Everyone should have and use this.
reviews.author: Jose P Martinez Jr

reviews.title: So glad I got this app
reviews.comment: Just got this last week and it\'s already helping me. It gives up to date weather warnings and has a live satellite. Tracks the storm and keeps me safe. Definitely recommended.
reviews.author: Thi Woodland

reviews.title: Just right
reviews.comment: Information ..without the entertainment... Love it..
reviews.author: Juan Bronson

reviews.title: Stay Informed.
reviews.comment: Excellent App. Stay Calm & Informed in an Emergency Situation. Note: Alert Locations can also be Manually Preset without using the GPS.
reviews.author: Stephen Gillian

reviews.title: Red Cross hurricane
reviews.comment: I really depend on this app because I had to take a trip from Buffalo NY to Tampa and what a nice tool to have for a safe trip, thank you all.
reviews.author: Isaac Day

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I down loaded this app  so I can keep an eye out for my family down in Louisiana. Looking at the whole app it has everything,  it will be very useful.
reviews.author: karen gullion

reviews.title: Not very user-friendly
reviews.comment: Offers no way to delete monitored locations
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Location map useless
reviews.comment: Lists alerts, but when I tap on one for Mississippi River it takes me to Des Moines Iowa, only about 200 off!
reviews.author: Mike Manley

reviews.comment: Great way to get ready for the next storm.
reviews.author: David Garrison

reviews.title: Unable to get it to work
reviews.comment: Was not able to get it to work. the application stopped unexpectedly that was the air that I kept getting so I just uninstalled it completely
reviews.author: Cardell Lovesr

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Active storm in the Gulf... and it says there are no alerts. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Miller

reviews.title: Multiple crashes lately
reviews.comment: I have appreciated this app until recently. I get alerts, request the info, and it crashes immediately.
reviews.author: Mark Worrell

reviews.title: Love all the apps
reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Dawn Rebecca
